title: GM Firing on All Cylinders, Investing in Natural Gas, Impact of VIX Spike
itunes:title: GM Firing on All Cylinders, Investing in Natural Gas, Impact of VIX Spike
description:
David Kudla, CEO at Mainstay Capital Management, discusses General Motors’ success and why they should not buy Tesla. Ryan Kelley, Portfolio Manager at Hennessy Funds, provides his outlook for natural gas. Sarah Ponczek, Bloomberg News Finance Reporter, and Ralph Drybrough, Co-Founder of StratiFi, look at using the VIX to take risk out of portfolios. We Drive to the Close with Jeff Krumpelman, CIO at Riverpoint Capital Management. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has the “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
